metadata.synopsis: The Visage of Heartlesness is standing near some shelves with goods that it took from people.
metadata.how_to_trigger: loadlevel SCL_Main_Ain recon: god onteleport S_TWN_Tollhouse_Face_HeartlessnessSpeak with Visage of Heartlessness

0.speaker: Visage of Heartlessness
0.text: You'll find much of sentimental value among the confiscated goods. That is to say - junk.
0.context: InternalNodeContext: The visage is disgusted at how little people had. Full poverty-shaming (because it wanted more.)

1.speaker: Visage of Heartlessness
1.text: People treasure the most insignificant things - pets, children, memories.
1.context: InternalNodeContext: Disparaging of how much ordinary people valued all their earthly goods. As far as it's concerned, this is all trash.
